article.Heading: Expect Budget to focus on agri, rural sectors: Kaveri Seed
article.Summary: Budget should boost rural economy and farmer financing which were hit by demonetisation, G Vijay Kumar, CFO of Kaveri Seed Company told CNBC-TV18.
article.Body:
Budget should boost the rural economy and farmer financing which were affected due to demonetisation, G Vijay Kumar, CFO of Kaveri Seed Company told CNBC-TV18.

On usage of cash on books, he said, "We are considering various options. Dividend, buyback and other few options are on the table."

Watch video for more…
